titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Peabody Museum of Natural History, Yale University, Records
Peabody Museum of Natural History, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Manuscripts and Archives Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:45

did.unittitle: Peabody Museum of Natural History, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, reports, deeds of gifts, inventories, statements, and publications documenting the activities and operations of the Peabody Museum of Natural History at Yale University.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 33-A (YRG 33-A), Records of the Peabody Museum of Natural History.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: While this collection as a whole is available for research, parts of it may be restricted due to law, university policy or fragility. Any restricted material will be noted as such.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Peabody Museum of Natural History, Yale University, Records (RU 471). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, reports, deeds of gifts, inventories, statements, and publications documenting the activities and operations of the Peabody Museum of Natural History at Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials in box 15 are restricted until January 1, 2035 as established by Yale Corporation regulations.

did.unittitle: I. Pre 1922 records, including records of George E. Brush and Charles Schuchert
American Association for the Advancement of Science
Letters of introduction given to members of staff
Photographs and printed matter, requests for
Picture and notes: old Peabody Museum
Wards Natural Science Establishment, Incorporated: Mineral Collector's Guide
VI. Student records and corporation votes

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Carl Owen Dunbar, BA Univ Kansas 1913; PhD Yale Univ 1917. Asst Geology 1917-1918, James Dwight Dana Research Fellow 1917-1918; Asst Prof Historical Geology 1920-1927, Assoc Prof 1927-1930; Prof Paleontology and Stratigraphy 1930-1959, Emeritus 1959-; Acting Chn Dept Geology 2d term 1958-1959; Asst Curator Invertebrate Paleontology 1920-1926, Curator 1926-1959, Emeritus 1959-; Dir Peabody Museum of Natural History 1942-1959, Emeritus 1959-; (Calhoun Coll 1956-).

did.unittitle: Records of Kwang-Chih Chang as curator of Anthropology

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access is restricted to Office of Origin only.

did.unittitle: Social Science Studies of China Subcommittee
Boards of Permanent Officers, Joint Meetings, including CVs

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access prohibited for the life of Alison Richard plus five years or 75 years after she left Yale, whichever is longer.
